verses.name: James 2:18
verses.text: Yea, a man may say, Thou hast faith, and I have works: shew me thy faith without thy works, and I will shew thee my faith by my works.

verses.name: James 2:19
verses.text: Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.

verses.name: James 2:20
verses.text: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?

verses.name: James 2:21
verses.text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar?

verses.name: James 2:22
verses.text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works, and by works was faith made perfect?
